text: Dame Kristin Scott Thomas (born 24 May 1960) is an English actress. She was born in Redruth, Cornwall. She received international praise in the 1990s for Four Weddings and a Funeral and The English Patient. She has acted in many other movies during her career. Her sister, Serena Scott Thomas (born 1961), is also an actress. == Other websites == * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Entertainers from Cornwall Category:Knights and Dames Commander of the Order of the British Empire
title: Kristin Scott Thomas
